text: Kɨ kamaghsua, bizir kɨ ifongezir mam iti, kɨ Kraisɨn ziamɨn nɨ mɨkemeghtɨ nɨ a damuam. Kɨ nɨn arazir aghuibagh fo, nɨ Kraisɨn adarazigh ifongezir arazim gɨfo, kamaghɨn kɨ akar gavgavim nɨ danighan kogham. Ezɨ igharaz darazigh ifongezir arazim ga isa uaningɨn suira, kamaghɨn amizɨma kɨ nɨmɨra nɨ mɨkɨmasa. Kɨ Pol, kɨ Krais Iesusɨn abuir gumazim, egha datɨrɨghɨn kɨ a bangɨn kalabusɨn iti.
